text: Charlie St. Cloud is a 2010 fantasy/romance movie produced by Marc Platt and Ben Sherwood and was directed by Burr Steers. The movie is based on the best selling novel, The Death and Life of Charlie St. Cloud. == Cast == * Zac Efron as Charlie St. Cloud * Charlie Tahan as Sam St. Cloud * Amanda Crew as Tess Carroll * Kim Basinger as Louise St. Cloud * Ray Liotta as Florio Ferrente * Donal Logue as Tink Weatherbee * Dave Franco as Sully * Augustus Prew as Alistair == Other websites == * Official website * Category:2010 romance movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American romance movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Charlie St. Cloud (movie)
